item.description:
Thanks, Patti, for sharing this idea. I want to put it out to the group.

Note: We'll be having our regular meetup on the 16th featuring Richard Wang. Details to follow!

On February 27th, The Shaw's Center in Brockton will be hosting Mardi Gras Madness, an evening of cajun cuisine, live music, roving entertainment, beads a plenty and much much more. Best of all the proceeds directly help children and families by supporting the Brockton Day Nursery Scholarship and BDN lends a hand funds. It's definitely worth the trip South of Boston!

Group discount rates available for tickets

~Monique
item.name: Mardi Gras Madness - As You Please!
